title: Lunar Revel Celebration!
body:
**Hey all,**

**We wanted to take a moment to thank everyone for the games!  It was an absolute blast, and we had a lot of fun screaming at each other here at Riot HQ.  Alas, the community will have a chance to revel (ha HA!) in their victory for now.**

**We'll make sure to come back stronger than ever ^.^**

**Enjoy Lunar Revel!**

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Update #4!

Game over....COMMUNITY WINS!  :D

Community: 3
Player Support:  1

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Update #3!

Game 3 has ended!  Player Support has been avenged!!!

Community: 2
Player Support:  1

----------------------------------------------------------

Game Update #2!

Game 2 was successfully thrown!

Community:  2
Player Support:  0

------------------------------------------------------------

Game Update #1!

Game Ended!

Community: 1
Player Support:  0

---------------------------------------------------------------

Hey everyone! 

	Lunar Revel is back, and to celebrate a bunch of us in Player Support want to play some games on the Rift with you guys.  Weâ€™re thinking of getting started around 3PM PST tomorrow (Feb 11th) and bringing our best Lunar Revel teams until 6ish PST.     

	PS is itching to launch some fireworks with everyone so keep an eye out for the *Lunar Revel Celebration* game lobby.  This thread will be updated with the password before each match. 

Looking forward to hanging out with everyone! ^.^  See ya then!

replies.body: Oo that's a fun way to celebrate the event :D

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ori5pUuE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-11T02:33:28.250+0000)
>
> Oo that's a fun way to celebrate the event :D

We're excited too. :D  Looking forward to meeting everyone.

Now by lunar teams, do you mean teams made up 100% of lunar skins, champions who have lunar skins, or just anybody?

Basically what I'm asking is can me and my $0 play too?

At the end of the day, you just have to ask yourself:  Do you love League?  If so then.....

YES!  :D
PST i assume?
Good question.
*very *good question -- edited the post for PST.
Game 1 was a lot of fun guys (even though we got ROFLstomped). My Jinx play was just not up to par... XD

That's a great idea! Player Support would love to play some Nemesis Draft with you guys and gals. :D  Look for a follow up post after the mode is released.   

Time to start brushing up on {{champion:6}} {{champion:78}} and {{champion:83}}
I just can't wait for them to give me Lulu. They will fear purple for a long time. Gah. This wait for nemesis is too long.
I haven't seen anyone give a Lulu on Nemesis Draft {{champion:40}} {{champion:267}} are sorta common thou.
2nd game, got Lulu. Fuck yeah. {{champion:54}}
I'll bring the shovel if you bring the hammer
Thanks for going easy on us, I haven't played Sona in a long time! Good luck and have fun to everyone in the next game!

Great game! The Corki mid meta shift has arrived! Thank you again for doing this kind of interaction too!
-The "Flashy" Leona

> Great game! The Corki mid meta shift has arrived! Thank you again for doing this kind of interaction too!

YOu did awesome leona Save my life a few times
Haha thank you! You did very well yourself! We united to defeat the riot forces (Well... we let them throw a little first XD)

Thanks for the great first game :)

- Annie

> [{quoted}](name=Soviet Union,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ori5pUuE,comment-id=001a,timestamp=2015-02-11T23:41:01.297+0000)

> Thanks for the great first game :)
>

I can attest, this Annie > my Annie.  Thanks for the great match.  {{champion:1}}
That was an epic game! That Riot Riven{{champion:92}}  was a true challenge but I won in the end ^-^ I was Cass {{champion:69}}
I really want to join in. how does it work? do i just keep refreshing this page to see when the game ends? i've got lunar revel cass {{champion:69}}

> [{quoted}](name=multipony,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ori5pUuE,comment-id=0025,timestamp=2015-02-12T00:57:07.364+0000)
>
> I really want to join in. how does it work? do i just keep refreshing this page to see when the game ends? i've got lunar revel cass {{champion:69}}

Multi Yes they will update the password but the lobby is always Lunar Revel Celebration so Keep you eye open the lobby is usually up before the password is posted and make sure you have private rooms on
Thank you very much. i'll keep refreshing!
Boy that was a great game 2 Thanks for playing Riot Support
Seems like Game 2's team community might be making a comeback.
Okay, I've never joined a "game lobby" before. so.... How do I do this?
From the custom games section
As long as I don't get banned  or my champion of preference doesn't get nerfed for pentakilling the Riot PS team

Great game! Thanks for such a fun game! :D

- Was Morgana {{champion:25}}
Good game guys! We had a blast :)
Is it Wrong im rooting for Team Riot?
Yay, I made it. Let's have fun! :D
Team Rito seems to be making their comeback!
Hope I get to join in! :D
Do u get Tripuhm ryze{{champion:13}}

- the terrible Annie mid
I'll bring my Lunar Goodness {{champion:131}}
Sounds like fun! Maybe I'll join in for a game :)
see you on europe servers... oh wait.
:( I tried to join and it said password does not match! :(
That level 1 Yasuo E trade man.

If game 2's passoword isn't dontcatchajinxrocket I will be sad

Edit: Consider myself sad.
What is the password for the second game?

Round 1 was really fun! It was great to get to play with you all!

(I was the Riven btw)

Was an amazingly fun first game.

Sincerely, the Jungle Vi
I believe its under custom games normal mode
well crap since I didn't get in the 1st game looks like I can't play a game with rioter's today since I have work from 5-9:30 =(
Is this game going to be under custom games? If so tournament or normal?{{champion:161}}
